# clickrup

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A client to interact wiht the 'ClickUp' 'API' <https://clickup.com/api/>. 'ClickUp' is a project management app, available at <https://clickup.com>.

## Installation

You can install the development version of clickrup from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jonthegeek/clickrup")
```
